snippet: The stock market seesawed on thin trading volume and ended higher on Wednesday’s half-day session. The market is closed on the Fourth of July holiday and will reopen on Friday.
abstract: Stock market ends slightly higher in a half-day session ahead of the Fourth of July holiday.
lead_paragraph: The stock market seesawed on thin trading volume and ended higher on Wednesday’s half-day session. The market is closed on the Fourth of July holiday and will reopen on Friday.

headline.main: Market Shows Small Gains in Short Session
headline.print_headline: Market Shows Small Gains in Short Session
